data.name: Please, Don't Touch Anything
data.description:
Please, Donâ€™t Touch Anything is a cryptic, brain-racking button-pushing puzzle game. 

Covering for a colleague taking a bathroom break, you find yourself in front of a mysterious console with a green screen monitor showing a pixelated live image of an unknown city. Also present is an ominous red button with the simple instruction to not touch anything! 

Push the red button once or press it many times. Your choices and actions will lead to outrageous and frightening consequences and over 30 unique puzzle endings.   

Scavenge the room for clues, tools, and buttons to solve riddles and trigger explosive events. This deceptively simple console has many mind-blowing surprises for you.

This updated version of the classic game features all new high-quality visuals, new mechanics, updated classic endings with new solutions, and a slew of new endings. 

Go ahead, press the button. You know you want to.

Pulsa el botÃ³n rojo tantas veces como quieras. Tus acciones tendrÃ¡n tremendas consecuencias y te llevarÃ¡n a mÃ¡s de 30 puzles finales diferentes.

Busca pistas, herramientas y botones por la habitaciÃ³n para resolver los acertijos y desencadenar eventos explosivos. Parece un juego simple, pero estÃ¡ lleno de increÃ­bles sorpresas.

Esta versiÃ³n actualizada del juego clÃ¡sico cuenta con nuevos grÃ¡ficos de gran calidad, nuevos mecanismos, finales clÃ¡sicos actualizados con nuevas soluciones y un montÃ³n de finales nuevos. 

Vamos, pulsa el botÃ³n. Â¡Lo estÃ¡s deseando!

Please, Don't Touch Anything Ã¨ un gioco con rompicapi criptici e non lineari nel quale premerai pulsanti a piÃ¹ non posso!
 
 Quando un tuo collega ti chiede di sostituirlo mentre lui va al bagno, ti ritrovi di fronte a una console misteriosa con uno schermo verde con delle immagini pixellate di una cittÃ  sconosciuta e un inquietante pulsante rosso con delle semplici istruzioni: "Non toccare nulla".
 
 Premi il pulsante rosso una o piÃ¹ volte. Le tue scelte avranno delle conseguenze incredibili che ti condurranno a oltre 30 finali differenti. 
 
 Esamina la stanza per trovare indizi, strumenti e pulsanti per risolvere i rompicapi e scatenare degli eventi esplosivi! Questa console apparentemente semplice Ã¨ ricca di sorprese! 
 
 Questa versione aggiornata del gioco classico include nuove grafiche ad alta qualitÃ , nuovi meccanismi di gioco, finali classici aggiornati con nuove soluzioni e tanti nuovi finali.
 
 Dai, cedi alla tentazione: premi il pulsante!
translations.short_description: Un gioco con rompicapi criptici e non lineari nel quale premere pulsanti a piÃ¹ non posso!

translations.long_description:
Please, Donâ€™t Touch Anything is een cryptisch, breinkrakend, knoppendrukkend, niet-lineair puzzelspel.

Terwijl je collega naar het toilet is gegaan, sta je voor een mysterieuze console met een groen gekleurde monitor die een pixelachtige onbekende stad toont. Je ziet tevens een onheilspellend ogende rode knop en een waarschuwing om niets aan te raken!

Druk Ã©Ã©nmalig op de rode knop, of meerdere malen. Je keuzes en actie zorgen voor waanzinnige gevolgen en meer dan 30 unieke puzzeleindes.

Doorzoek de kamer voor hints, gereedschappen, en knoppen om raadsels mee op te lossen en explosieve evenementen te veroorzaken. Deze simpel ogende console heeft een hoop onverwachte verrassingen voor je in petto.

Deze update van de klassieker bevat een geheel nieuwe visuele update, nieuwe mechanismen, vernieuwde klassieke eindes met nieuwe oplossingen, en een hoop nieuwe eindes.

Ga je gang, druk op de knop. Je weet dat je het wil.
translations.short_description: Een cryptisch, breinkrakend, knoppendrukkend, niet-lineair puzzelspel

translations.long_description:

Du dekker for en kollega som er pÃ¥ toalettet, og du finner deg selv foran en mystisk konsoll med en grÃ¸nn skjerm som viser et pikselert bilde av en ukjent by. En illevarslende rÃ¸d knapp med den enkle meldingen om at du ikke skal rÃ¸re noe, er ogsÃ¥ pÃ¥ plass! 

Trykk pÃ¥ den rÃ¸de knappen en eller mange ganger. Valgene og handlingene dine fÃ¸rer til sjokkerende konsekvenser med over 30 unike utganger pÃ¥ spillet.

Let gjennom rommet etter ledetrÃ¥der, verktÃ¸y og knapper for Ã¥ lÃ¸se gÃ¥ter og utlÃ¸se eksplosive hendelser. Denne utrolig enkle konsollen har mange overraskelser til deg.

Denne oppdaterte versjonen av det klassiske spillet, inneholder alle de nye hÃ¸ykvalitets uttrykkene, den nye mekanikken, oppdaterte klassiske avslutninger med nye lÃ¸sninger og en haug med nye avslutninger. 

Kom igjen, trykk pÃ¥ knappen. Du vet at du vil.

translations.long_description:
Please, Don't Touch Anything to enigmatyczna gra logiczna o otwartej strukturze i wielu przyciskach.

ZastÄ™pujÄ…c korzystajÄ…cego z toalety kolegÄ™, trafiasz na jego stanowisko pracy. Widzisz tajemniczÄ… konsolÄ™ i zielony ekran przedstawiajÄ…cy rozpikselowany obraz jakiegoÅ› miasta. TuÅ¼ obok dostrzegasz zaÅ› wielki czerwony przycisk z prostÄ… instrukcjÄ…: â€niczego nie dotykajâ€!

Zbadaj pokÃ³j i poszukaj wskazÃ³wek, narzÄ™dzi oraz przyciskÃ³w, ktÃ³re pomogÄ… ci rozwiÄ…zaÄ‡ zagadki i wywoÅ‚aÄ‡ wybuchowe wydarzenia. Zwodniczo prosta konsola kryje w sobie wiele niespodzianek.

Nowa, zaktualizowana wersja tej klasycznej gry przedstawia odnowionÄ… grafikÄ™, nowe mechanizmy rozgrywki, ulepszone klasyczne zakoÅ„czenia (wraz z nowymi rozwiÄ…zaniami, ktÃ³re do nich prowadzÄ…), a nawet szereg nowych finaÅ‚Ã³w.

translations.long_description:
Please, Don't Touch Anything Ã© um jogo nÃ£o linear e enigmÃ¡tico, de quebrar a cabeÃ§a e apertar botÃµes.

Quando um colega de trabalho que precisa ir ao banheiro te pede para substituÃ­-lo, vocÃª se encontra diante de uma mÃ¡quina misteriosa, com uma tela verde que transmite a imagem pixelada, ao vivo, de uma cidade desconhecida. HÃ¡ tambÃ©m um botÃ£o vermelho inquietante e uma sÃ³ instruÃ§Ã£o: nÃ£o toque em nada!

Aperte o botÃ£o vermelho uma vez... ou vÃ¡rias. Suas aÃ§Ãµes terÃ£o consequÃªncias chocantes e levarÃ£o a mais de 30 finais diferentes.

Examine a sala em busca de pistas, ferramentas e botÃµes para resolver enigmas e desencadear eventos explosivos. Esta mÃ¡quina, que parece tÃ£o simples, tem muitas surpresas delirantes esperando por vocÃª.

Esta versÃ£o atualizada do clÃ¡ssico jogo conta com grÃ¡ficos de alta qualidade, novos mecanismos e finais clÃ¡ssicos atualizados com novas soluÃ§Ãµes, alÃ©m de vÃ¡rios finais inÃ©ditos.

Vai lÃ¡, aperta o botÃ£o... vocÃª estÃ¡ morrendo de vontade!

translations.long_description:
Please, Don't Touch Anything est un jeu Ã  Ã©nigmes... Ã©nigmatique, dans lequel on appuie sur des boutons.

Alors que vous montez la garde pour un collÃ¨gue en pause pipi, vous vous retrouvez face Ã  une mystÃ©rieuse console avec un Ã©cran vert affichant l'image pixÃ©lisÃ©e d'une ville inconnue, et pour unique commande un bouton rouge, ainsi qu'un message Â« Merci de ne rien toucher Â» !

Appuyez une seule ou plusieurs fois : vos dÃ©cisions auront des consÃ©quences dÃ©lirantes qui conduiront Ã  plus de 30 fins diffÃ©rentes.

Examinez tous les recoins de la piÃ¨ce Ã  la recherche d'indices, d'outils et de boutons pour rÃ©soudre les Ã©nigmes et dÃ©voiler la suite des Ã©vÃ©nements... explosifs. Cette console Ã  l'apparence anodine est pleine de surprises !

Cette mise Ã  jour du jeu classique comporte de nouveaux graphismes, de nouvelles mÃ©caniques de jeu, de nouvelles maniÃ¨res de dÃ©bloquer les fins du jeu d'origine, ainsi que tout un tas de nouvelles fins.

Allez-y, vous en avez envie... Appuyez sur le bouton !
translations.short_description: Un jeu Ã©nigmatique, non linÃ©aire, Ã  s'arracher les cheveux, dans lequel on appuie sur des boutons...

Pressiona o botÃ£o vermelho uma vez... ou vÃ¡rias. As tuas escolhas e aÃ§Ãµes terÃ£o consequÃªncias absurdas e mais de 30 finais de puzzles diferentes.

changelog.change_log:
Since its launch in 2019, hundreds of thousands of people have ignored our warning, and pressed the big red button! Actually, youâ€™ve touched a lot of things that we specifically asked you not to, discovering that what appears to be a simple room with a screen and an enticing red button is actually hiding countless clues, devious puzzles, and insane consequences ranging from ending the world, to taking you back in time.

To celebrate the gameâ€™s 3rd anniversary, weâ€™ve been working on a big update for the game to address player feedback, improve quality of life, and, in spots, give the game some visual polish. Plus countless bug fixes!

NEW
* Achievements! We now support Meta Achievements in the game - try and unlock them all!
* Seated Mode. Players can now play the game seated. Take a load off and relax!
* Height Adjustment. You can now manually adjust your player height in the game settings.
* Distance Grab. Grabbable objects can now be interacted with at a distance, making it easier for players using a stationary boundary, playing in seated mode, or with limited mobility.
* Snap Rotation. Flick the thumbstick left/right to do small quick turns. Flick the thumbstick back to do a 180 quick turn. 

IMPROVEMENTS
* Complete interaction overhaul. Weâ€™ve gone through every interaction in the game and reworked them to make it easier to grab, throw, press, and toggle objects in the room. 
* Improvements to handling the Hammer, Screwdriver, and Phone.
* Thrown objects will no longer disappear/fall through the world
* Grabbable object highlighting. A green outline will appear around grabbable objects, making them much easier to find.
* Teleport UI improvements. Now much easier to see where you can and cannot teleport to.
* Weâ€™ve enhanced 10 of the gameâ€™s endings to add more visual excitement.
-- Visual improvements to the creature model in the alien ending.
* Added haptics to more interactions:
-- Pushing buttons
-- Hover over grabbable objects
-- Grab/release objects
-- Hit something with the hammer
-- Write on or erase the whiteboard
* Fixed missing font characters in Polish and Turkish translations
* Menu additions/improvements:
-- Player Height slider
-- Standing / Seated Mode toggle
-- Distance Grab toggle
-- Player Controls Diagram
-- Improved highlighting in Language selection

Please Don't Touch Anything
Patch Notes - v2.1

5/5/2020

We asked you nicely not to touch anything, but you did... and had a great time! So here are a few things to make intentionally touching what you should not even better:

- Buttons and wheels respond more naturally and follow the laws of physics. You definitely should not be touching them, but if youâ€™re feeling rebellious they should now be easier to use.

- Books and other held objects are oriented correctly when held or opened. Should you choose to hold them or open them... which you were politely asked not to.

- Binders should not be touched. But if you pick one up, no other binders will launch discontentedly for not being The Chosen One.

- The stamp now shows a green return position outline... should you want to make it seem like you in fact, did not touch it.

- In an attempt to rid the room of haunted spirits, audio is now spatialized around the correct position (your head).

- The credits have been updated because inclusion is nice ğŸ˜€

Please Don't Touch Anything
Patch Notes - v1.2

8/1/2019

-Equations book, dry erase board eraser and binders are now easier to pick up
-Telephone screen helper resets when you hang up the phone
-Intro screens now clearly tell the player to tap the A button to continue
-Objects like the dry erase marker, stapler, Papers Please trophy should no longer appear to impale the player's hand when held
-Stamp is now held normally when picked up
-Phone receiver should no longer get knocked onto the desk when opening the drawer
-Black light correctly positioned when opening the drawer
-Objects should no longer fall to the ground if you accidentally knock them against another object in the world while holding them
-Reset Switch now easier to activate

Please Don't Touch Anything Patch Notes - v1.1 7/30/2019 

-Starting height of player in-game adjusted to accurately reflect player's actual height, and whether they are sitting or standing 
-Made the Red Nuke Switch easier to press
-Outline on in-game hands thinned out to be less distracting 
-Holding the grip button down while hovering over the reset switch or the throw switch no longer locks the player into a grab animation
-Made blacklight easier to pickup on first grab -Telephone no longer randomly floats away 
-Teleporter is now just one click -Players no longer can float up/down in the game 
-Improved the grip button threshold to make it easier to pick up objects

Put Limits on the adjusting height
Changed starting camera position slightly in title screen
